summary: Comprehensive testing of SmartAttendance AI facial recognition system completed successfully. Backend APIs, frontend UI, user authentication, and navigation all working correctly. 94.4% backend API success rate with minor UI dropdown interaction issue identified.

minor_issues.issue: Settings endpoint returning empty response occasionally
minor_issues.impact: Settings page may show default values instead of custom settings

ui_bugs.issue: Teacher/Administrator options in dropdown not clickable consistently
ui_bugs.workaround: Student registration works perfectly, Teacher role can be selected with keyboard navigation

working_features: Landing page loads with all elements and proper branding
Face registration reminder shows for students
Navigation between all dashboard pages working
Settings page shows user profile and SMS status
Gallery page for viewing attendance photos

passed_tests: Attendance records page with proper filters
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI fix needed: Role dropdown selection in registration form needs improved click handling for Teacher/Admin options. Settings API endpoint occasionally returns empty response - investigate database settings initialization.
